intension: Create an invitation card for an origami class that teaches the attendees how to make flowers and animals. The class is from 5 PM to 6.30 PM on Jan 9th. More information is available on the website myorigami.net.
globalcaption: The image features a red paper bird, possibly a crane, with its wings spread out. The bird is positioned in the center of the image, with its wings covering a significant portion of the frame. The bird's wings are folded in a way that creates a sense of depth and dimension. The background is a blue gradient, which adds a contrasting color to the red bird.
keywords: origami, animal, announcement, bird, class, course, creative, education, entertainment, imagination, learn, making, paper, papercraft, red, sheet, white, workshop, blue, post, instagram, ig, insta

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a red bird, possibly a pigeon, flying in the air. The bird is positioned in the center of the scene, with its wings spread wide as it soars. The background consists of a blue sky, which contrasts nicely with the vibrant red color of the bird. The overall composition of the image is simple and visually appealing
